text: Today, I’m in engineering studies. I’m learning all about materials, including physics and chemistry at different scales, from atoms to objects. Actually, I wasn’t dreaming about that when I was younger, but I knew one thing : I would work in science field. When I was 15, I went to the INSERM in Paris for an internship because I was interested to work in laboratories of drugstore and find new ways to save people from sickness. It was really interesting but then, I talk about studies with my family because it was time to think about my future. My father is an engineer himself and he told me many things about this field. I learned other informations by myself convicing me that I was finding the perfect type of studies for me. At the end of college, I had to choose between those two differents futures. But even if I wanted to save the world, like many people actually, my interest was focus on materials. I told myself that I could save lives as much as a doctor, but it would be from another way. I really like what I learn and I know that my choice was the best. I’ve always been much influenced by my father, and today he helps me so much. My mother isn’t an engineer, but she always helped me to take good decisions like this one. It’s been four years I’m following physical and chemical classes and this year, my brother will enter in the same school after being inspirated by my parents and by myself.
